capability.name: Collections
capability.definition: Handles the liquidation of assets to offset the losses for problem accounts
capability.role: Administer the recovery and/or liquidation of collateral against problem accounts
capability.example: Collateral held against a failed account is valued and submitted for liquidation to recover losses

key_features.name: Assess account status and determine collections approach
key_features.description: Enables assess account status and determine collections approach to support handles the liquidation of assets to offset the losses for problem accounts

key_features.name: Collateral title and valuation assessment
key_features.description: Enables collateral title and valuation assessment to support handles the liquidation of assets to offset the losses for problem accounts

key_features.name: Collateral Liquidation
key_features.description: Enables collateral liquidation to support handles the liquidation of assets to offset the losses for problem accounts

key_features.name: Account/debt factoring
key_features.description: Enables account/debt factoring to support handles the liquidation of assets to offset the losses for problem accounts
